segmentDescription.description: Detailed summary of the video segment, focusing on people, places, and actions taking place. Segment the video into stories or chapters. A story (chapter) in a video is a self-contained portion of the program dedicated to a specific news story, topic, or theme. Each segment typically includes a distinct introduction, development, and (sometimes) a conclusion, and can feature a combination of elements such as reporter narration, interviews, sound bites, relevant footage (B-roll), and graphics.
